Name: Block_Quotes
Mission Terrace: ['The Mission Terrace neighborhood is safe and quiet and located about a half mile from the heart of the Mission and popular Bernal Heights. The perfect place to recharge after a busy day sightseeing or to get some work done.', 'The neighborhood is super mellow, yet convenient to just about everywhere we needed to be in SF.']

Name: Lede
Mission Terrace: Mission Terrace approaches San Franciscos outskirts, but this friendly community shares the same intimate vibe of its more central neighbors. Colorful homes replete with blooming gardens line Mission Terraces surprisingly sunny streets, and local markets and pizza parlors are more common than strip malls and national chains. Although its bounded by several transportation corridors (freeways and BART stations included) Mission Terrace manages to remain quiet while providing quick access to energetic nighttime neighborhoods.

Mission Terrace: ['Sunshine in a Well-Connected San Francisco Neighborhood']

Name: Intro
Mission Terrace: Mission Terrace enjoys more sunshine than most of its more centrally located neighbors.

Name: Photo_Captions
Mission Terrace: ["Mission Terrace's intimate persona emanates from its modest, multi-level homes and serene residential streets.", "The neighborhood's local park provides a place for residents to gather.", "Whether they're hoping to skate rails or climb jungle gyms, visitors can find their personal kind of recreational outlets.", "As quiet as it is, don't be fooled into thinking Mission Terrace is miles away from San Francisco's bustling hub.", 'A light-rail line and its own BART station keep the neighborhood well-connected.', "From its corner store to its pizza parlor and pop-up gas-station boutique, Mission Terrace's local businesses preserve the neighborhood's homegrown personality.", 'A little love from your local robot.']
